text: @Adam_Creighton @P_Kooky Suggest you interview Boris and get his "updated" opinion, as a "high risk of Coronavirus mortality" myself, my immediate impulse is to hope you get it, but I'm not so unkind, if you do, as a confirmed atheist I will pray for you
